sentences.en: A dust particle weighs only a thousandth of a gram.
sentences.cn: 一粒尘埃的重量仅有千分之一克.

sentences.en: A micrometer is one thousandth of one millimeter.
sentences.cn: 一微米是一毫米的千分之一.

sentences.en: A millimeter is one - thousandth of a meter.
sentences.cn: 一毫米是一米的千分之一.

sentences.en: A millivolt is one thousandth of a volt.
sentences.cn: 一毫伏是一伏的千分之一.

sentences.en: As if that were not enough of an impact, sunscreens increasingly contain nanoparticles, smaller than one one-thousandth the diameter of a human hair.
sentences.cn: 就像是怕以前作用还不够似的，现在防晒霜遮阳剂包含的纳米粒子越来越多，比人类头发直径的千分之一还小。

sentences.en: Each day, we will be charged for thousandth of the contract amount.
sentences.cn: 天天支付合同总金额的千分之一.

sentences.en: He repeated the sentence for the thousandth time.
sentences.cn: 他把那句话重复了无数遍.

sentences.en: I told him for the thousandth time.
Micrometre: One - thousandth of a millimeter.
sentences.cn: 微米: 百万分之一米.

sentences.en: Mil: One - thousandth of an inch.
One nanosecond is equal to one - thousandth of one - millionth of one second.
sentences.cn: 1毫微秒等于一秒的十万万分之一.
电容单位等于千分之一法拉.
这座城市的一千周年纪念

sentences.en: The magazine has just published its six thousandth edition.
sentences.cn: 这本杂志刚刚出了第六千版.

sentences.en: The phone rings for the thousandth time.
These high-energy gamma rays, detected by Fermi’s Large Area Telescope (LAT), have wavelengths one-thousandth the size of an atomic nucleus.
sentences.cn: 这些“费米大天区望远镜（LAT）”所侦测到的高能伽马射线的波长仅相当于原子核大小的千分之一。

sentences.en: We always use per thousand sign to express a thousandth.
sentences.cn: 我们总是用千分号表示千分数.

words.tran_cn: 千分之一的；[数]第一千的

trans.tran_cn: 第一千的, 千分之一的
